BuddyPress Courseware

Social LMS

BuddyPress is an open source social network project.
BuddyPress Courseware is a learning management system built to make teaching social again.

Buy the book from Packt Pub.
BuddyPress Courseware is maintained by Coursewa.re after being part of Google Summer of Code programme in 2010 and 2011 (accepted and mentored by WordPress and ScholarPress mentors).
